## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                             | Type                  | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `forId`    | `for-id`   | The id of a labelable form-related element.                             | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `position` | `position` | The position determines where and how the label behaves inside an item. | `"block" \| "inline"` | `"block"`   |
